com.lukflug.panelstudio.base

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.base.Context

  • public final class Context
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for the communication between a component and its parent.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Context(Context context, int width, java.awt.Point offset, boolean focus, boolean onTop)
      Constructor that should be used when a parent is calling a method by the child.
      Context(IInterface inter, int width, java.awt.Point position, boolean focus, boolean onTop)
      Constructor that should be used by the root parent.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Context

        public Context(Context context,
               int width,
               java.awt.Point offset,
               boolean focus,
               boolean onTop)
        Constructor that should be used when a parent is calling a method by the child. inter and onTop are inherited without modification.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the parent
        width - the width of the component
        offset - the relative position of the component
        focus - focus state of the parent
        onTop - whether component is in the front

      • Context

        public Context(IInterface inter,
               int width,
               java.awt.Point position,
               boolean focus,
               boolean onTop)
        Constructor that should be used by the root parent.
        Parameters:
        inter - the current IInterface
        width - the width of the component
        position - the position of the component
        focus - set to false, to disable the component from having focus
        onTop - set to false, if a component is above another component at the current cursor position

      • hasFocus

        public boolean hasFocus()
        Returns the focus state of the parent.
        Returns:
        the focus state of the parent

      • onTop

        public boolean onTop()
        Check if component is the highest at cursor position.
        Returns:
        set to false, if another component is above this component at the current mouse cursor position

      • requestFocus

        public void requestFocus()
        Used to indicate to the parent that the current component has to have focus within the parent.

      • releaseFocus

        public void releaseFocus()
        Reverses requestFocus() and ask parent not to request focus.

      • foucsRequested

        public boolean foucsRequested()
        Returns focusRequested.
        Returns:
        whether the child is requesting focus.

      • focusReleased

        public boolean focusReleased()
        Returns focusOverride.
        Returns:
        whether the parent may request focus.

      • isHovered

        public boolean isHovered()
        Get mouse hover state.
        Returns:
        set to true, if mouse is hovering and component isn't below another one

      • isClicked

        public boolean isClicked(int button)
        Get mouse click state.
        Parameters:
        button - the mouse button to check
        Returns:
        set to true, if isHovered() is true and the mouse button is clicked

      • getRect

        public java.awt.Rectangle getRect()
        Get rectangle indicating component position.
        Returns:
        construct a rectangle out of the current component position and size

      • getDescription

        public Description getDescription()
        Get the description set by the child.
        Returns:
        the current description

        public void setDescription(Description description)
        Set the description when rendering.
        Parameters:
